attributes.action: jail any person who is caught with pictures, or does rape or any sexual acts.
attributes.background: Any person caught with pictures or any sexual acts to minors to be sentenced to at least 5 year

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do. You could start a new petition explaning clearly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign this petition if it calls for something you'd like to happen.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232579

You are more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.
